description.english: Finish the game on hard difficulty
description.german: Beende das Spiel in der höchsten Schwierigkeitsstufe
description.french: Finissez la partie en niveau Difficile
description.italian: Termina il gioco in difficoltà hard
description.spanish: Termina el juego en dificultad difícil

description.english: Find the hidden Easter Egg island
description.german: Finde die verborgene Ostereiinsel
description.french: Trouvez l'île aux Oeufs de Pâques cachée
description.italian: Trova l'isola Uovo di Pasqua nascosto
description.spanish: Encuentra la isla del huevo de Pascua oculto

description.english: Get 10 Enemy archers to hit other clown soldiers with their arrows
description.german: Erhalten Sie 10 feindliche Bogenschützen zu anderen Clown Soldaten mit ihren Pfeilen getroffen
description.french: Menez 10 archers ennemis à tirer des flèches sur d'autres soldats clowns
description.italian: Ottenere 10 arcieri nemici da colpire altri soldati pagliaccio con le loro frecce
description.spanish: Obtén 10 arqueros enemigos para golpear a otros soldados de payaso con sus flechas

description.english: 100% accuracy with the Ballista in Tickle Town
description.german: 100% Genauigkeit mit der Ballista in Kitzelstadt
description.french: Précision de 100% au Balliste à Tickle Town
description.italian: 100% di precisione con il Ballista in Tickle Town
description.spanish: 100% de precisión con el Ballista en Tickle Town

description.english: Find and open all 8 treasure chests
description.german: Finde und öffne alle 8 Schatztruhen
description.french: Trouvez et ouvrez chacun des 8 coffres à trésor
description.italian: Trovare e aprire tutte le 8 casse del tesoro
description.spanish: Buscar y abrir los 8 cofres del tesoro

description.english: Defeat 10 enemies in a row without getting hit
description.german: Besiege 10 Gegner hintereinander, ohne getroffen zu werden
description.french: Vaincre 10 ennemis d'affilée sans être tocuhé
description.italian: Sconfiggi 10 nemici di fila senza essere colpiti
description.spanish: Derrota a 10 enemigos en fila sin ser golpeado

description.spanish: Termina el juego en dificultad media

description.english: Perform a 35 hit combo
description.german: Führen Sie eine 35-Treffer-Kombo
description.french: Accomplissez 35 attaques d'affilée
description.italian: Eseguire una combo di 35 hit
description.spanish: Haz un combo de 35 hit

description.english: Complete the Camp Folly obstacle course without triggering any rooster alarms
description.german: Komplettiere das Lager Torheit Hinderniskurs ohne Hahnalarm auszulösen

description.italian: Completare ostacoli Camp Folly senza far scattare alcun allarme gallo
description.spanish: Completar la carrera de obstáculos de Camp Folly  sin activar ninguna alarma gallo

description.english: Defeat 100 enemies without using a finisher
description.german: Besiege 100 Gegner ohne einen Finisher (??) zu benutzen
description.french: Vaincre 100 ennemis sans utiliser de coup fatal
description.italian: Sconfiggi 100 nemici senza l'utilizzo di una stazione di finitura
description.spanish: Vence a 100 enemigos sin necesidad de utilizar una unidad de acabado

description.english: Achieve 5 stars in every act
description.german: Erreiche 5 Sterne in jeder Akt
description.french: Obtenez 5 étoiles pour chaque action
description.italian: Ottenere 5 stelle in ogni atto
description.spanish: Lograr 5 estrellas en todos los actos

description.english: Defeat 10 enemies with the hammer throw attack

description.spanish: Golpee a 15 enemigos de una cornisa

description.english: Allow an outhouse to spawn 10 enemies before destroying it

description.spanish: Deje una letrina para desovar a 10 enemigos antes de destruirlo
